pageContext.claim: “As they have learned in the last two years, our great American Farmers know that China will not be able to hurt them in that their President has stood with them and done what no other president would do - And I'll do it again next year if necessary!”
pageContext.analysis: The Trump administration did offer subsidies to farmers in order to offset the drop off in soybean exports to China, which was caused by Trump’s tariffs. However, even if or when the tariffs are reversed, there’s no guarantee that the Chinese will buy from American farmers again and the subsidies are not permanent.
